ygData.subject: Re: Bidl Frugrin Location Confirmed
ygData.msgSnippet: I was recently on the test server checking out the racewar code and saw a !Bidl Frugrin (the ! meaning its a deactivated NPC) near Kelethin. I coaxed a guide
ygData.messageBody:
I was recently on the test server checking out the racewar code and saw a
!Bidl Frugrin (the ! meaning its a deactivated NPC) near Kelethin. I coaxed
a guide into telling me the origins of this NPC through petition. He said
Bidl is a wandering NPC that randomly appears in EITHER lesser faydark OR
greater faydark. I just found it funny that I finally found him when he
wasn't working 8)


-----Original Message-----
From: Joshua Bednarz <thewhitemage@...>
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, July 24, 1999 9:04 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] I know how to get three of the lenses.


>From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
>Yes, you do in fact haev to kill the gnomes that tell you to come back in a
>few weeks. I read on a site that that someone got three of the lenses one
>fron the dark elf and two from killing the gnomes that tell you to come
back
>in a few weeks. This is only what he said, so it looks like we will have to
>kill some of our own brethren to get the quest done. But it's still that
one
>last lens thats missing. I also heard that someone saw Bidl Frugrin in the
>clutches of the evil Erudites in thier palace. I'm going to check it out
>soon and make a new character and see.
>
>
